flavor: She's a scythe for sore eyes.

name: Duskbat
text: Battlecry: If your hero took damage this turn, summon two 1/1 Bats.
flavor: Happily married with two kids. It was love at first bite.

name: Duskhaven Hunter
text: [x]Stealth\nEach turn this is in your hand,\nswap its Attack and Health.
flavor: After a short paws, she's back to herself again.

name: Duskhaven Hunter
text: [x]Stealth\nEach turn this is in your hand,\nswap its Attack and Health.

name: Exterminate
text: Echo.\nDeal $10 damage to a minion and any excess to the enemy hero.

name: Face Collector
text: Echo\nBattlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavor: “I’ll trade you a Malfurion for an Anduin.”

name: Ferocious Howl
text: Draw a card.\nGain 1 Armor for each card in your hand.
flavor: Have you ever heard the wolf cry to the blue corn moon?

name: Gilnean Tracker
text: [x]Rush\nAt the start of your turn,\ntransform this into a 5/5.

name: Grave Mistake
text: Hero Power\nTrigger all minions' Deathrattles twice.

name: Grizzled Reinforcement
text: Battlecry: Summon an extra Cannon.

name: Hack
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. Then do it four more times.

name: Hefty Sack of Coins
text: Summon a random 3, 6, and 9-Cost minion.

name: Hench-Clan Thug
text: After your hero attacks, give this minion +1/+1.
flavor: Hard time making ends meet? Hate the League of Explorers? Get a job henching!

name: Hunter of Old
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Spell Damage +2.

name: Hunter's Insight
text: Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by_(3).

name: Impetuous Companion
text: Battlecry: Swap hands with your opponent.

name: Marsh Drake
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Poisonous Drakeslayer for your opponent.
flavor: She would have gotten away with it, if it weren't for that meddling Drakeslayer.

name: Nightmare Amalgam
text: [x]This is an Elemental, Mech,\nDemon, Murloc, Dragon,\nBeast, Pirate and Totem.
flavor: Be all that you can be.

name: Paragon of Light
text: While this minion has 3 or more Attack, it has Taunt and Lifesteal.
flavor: She’s all fun and games until someone rings that stupid bell.

name: Phantom Militia
text: Echo\nTaunt
flavor: Recruited from the Gilnean opera house.

name: Plague of Murlocs
text: Give your minions: "Deathrattle: Summon a random Murloc."

name: Pristine Compass
text: Draw a card and add 2 extra copies of it to your hand. They cost (0).

name: Pumpkin Peasant
text: [x]Lifesteal\nEach turn this is in your hand,\nswap its Attack and Health.
flavor: Time to squash your opponent.

name: Pumpkin Peasant
text: [x]Lifesteal\nEach turn this is in your hand,\nswap its Attack and Health.

name: Rabid Worgen
text: Rush
flavor: "I'm sorry, son.  We had to send Old Howler off…to a farm…to play…"

name: Ratcatcher
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain its Attack and Health.
flavor: He's on the hunt for Togwaggle's missing rat.

name: Ravencaller
text: [x]Battlecry: Add two\nrandom 1-Cost minions\nto your hand.
flavor: That Friends and Familiars Plan is really paying off!

name: Scythe
text: Doesn't lose Durability. When you kill a minion with this weapon, gain +1 Attack.

name: Shaw's Shank
text: Has +1_Attack for each friendly minion you control.

name: Sneak Attack
text: Put 2 random minions from your hand into the battlefield and give them Charge.

name: Splitting Sapling
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Woodchips.

name: Survival of the Fittest
text: Hero Power\nAll minions attack random enemy minions.

name: Tanglefur Mystic
text: Battlecry: Add a random\n2-Cost minion to each player's hand.
flavor: Doom!  Only doom for you!  But pay good tip, maybe less doom.

name: The Exorcisor
text: Silence any minion attacked by this weapon.

name: Toki, Time-Tinker
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage\nto all minions and choose\na Passive Treasure.

name: Transforming Tracker
text: Rush\nAt the start of your turn, transform this into a 7/7 with Windfury.

name: Vampiric Fangs
text: Destroy a minion. Restore its Health to your hero.

name: Vivid Nightmare
text: [x]Choose a friendly minion.\nSummon a copy of it with\n1 Health remaining.
flavor: "I… I dreamed I accidentally crafted a golden Millhouse! It was so REAL!"

name: Voodoo Doll
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Deathrattle: Destroy the chosen minion.
flavor: "Aww, I love it! It even kinda looks like me."

name: Walnut Sprite
text: Echo
flavor: How do you make a walnut laugh? Crack it up!

name: Witch's Cauldron
text: After a friendly minion dies, add a random Shaman spell to your hand.
flavor: Eye of murloc, ear of bat, foot of Fordring, fur of cat…

name: Witching Hour
text: Summon a random friendly Beast that died this game.
flavor: The gates to the Gilnean pet cemetary MUST remain locked at all times.

name: Worgen Tracker
text: Rush\nWindfury

name: Arcane Keysmith
text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret. Put it into the battlefield.
flavor: She sells all manner of keys: from A flat to G sharp.

name: Bellringer Sentry
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
flavor: "Who are you? Eh, none of my business."

name: Blood Witch
text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your_hero.
flavor: Like a sloppy joe for vampires.

name: Butch
text: Rush Has +1/+1 for each friendly Beast that died this game.

name: Devour Soul
text: Hero Power\nHalve the enemy hero's Health.

name: Dire Frenzy
text: Give a Beast +3/+3. Shuffle 3 copies into your deck with +3/+3.
flavor: It's always Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer.

name: Enchanting Tune
text: Gain control of all enemy minions. Set their Attack and Health to 1.

name: Felsoul Inquisitor
text: Lifesteal\nTaunt
flavor: Everyone expects an inquisition reference.

name: Fiendish Circle
text: [x]Summon four 1/1 Imps.
flavor: Like a knitting circle, but less evil.

name: Forest Guide
text: At the end of your turn, both players draw a card.
flavor: "Just sign this waiver, and we'll be on our way."

name: Gattling Gunner
text: Whenever you play a card, deal damage equal to its Cost to a random enemy minion.

name: Gilnean Vigilante
text: Battlecry: Destroy a\nminion and fill your\nhand with Coins.

name: Houndmaster Shaw
text: Your other minions have\nRush.
flavor: They’re good dogs, Tess.

name: Infected Quillflinger
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.

name: Lifedrinker
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to\nthe enemy hero. Restore\n#3 Health to your hero.
flavor: In a pinch, he'll also settle for Holy Water: Zero.

name: Mad Hatter
text: [x]Battlecry: Randomly toss\n3 hats to other minions.\nEach hat gives +1/+1.
flavor: He's entirely bonkers. All the best goblins are.

name: Militia Commander
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Gain +3_Attack this turn.
flavor: She only needs two commands: "Heel" and "Sic 'em!"

name: Mistwraith
text: Whenever you play an Echo_card, gain +1/+1.
flavor: One little Mistwraith sitting in a tree. M-I-S-T-I-N-G.

name: Night Prowler
text: Battlecry: If this is the only minion on the battlefield, gain +3/+3.
flavor: Listen to the mew-sic of the night.

name: Royal Gift
text: Give a minion +2/+2 for each minion you control.

name: Sack of Gnomes
text: Fill your board with random Gnomes.

name: Sandbinder
text: Battlecry: Draw an Elemental from your deck.
flavor: The secret is glue.

name: Scaleworm
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Rush.
flavor: A popular local alternative to bananas.

name: Soul Assimilation
text: Destroy your Wisps.\nGain control of a random enemy minion for each Wisp destroyed.

name: Spectral Cutlass
text: [x]Lifesteal Whenever you play a card from another class, gain +1 Durability.
flavor: So sharp it can cut through a spectral tomato!

name: Swift Messenger
text: [x]Rush\nEach turn this is in your hand,\nswap its Attack and Health.
flavor: Same turn delivery - guaranteed!

name: Swift Messenger
text: [x]Rush\nEach turn this is in your hand,\nswap its Attack and Health.

name: Terrify
text: [x]Hero Power Shuffle a minion into its owner's deck. It costs (4) less.

name: The Glass Knight
text: [x]Divine Shield\nWhenever you restore Health,\ngain Divine Shield.
flavor: She seems scary, but she's got a glass jaw.

name: Totem Cruncher
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Destroy your Totems. Gain +2/+2 for each destroyed.
flavor: When regular totem hours won't cut it.

name: Toxmonger
text: [x]Whenever you play a 1-Cost\nminion, give it Poisonous.
flavor: Not all spiders are born poisonous. That's where he comes in.

name: Tuskarr Raider
text: Rush\nAfter this minion attacks, fire your Cannons.

name: Unpowered Steambot
text: Taunt
flavor: Overpowered Steambot got nerfed.

name: Vex Crow
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random\n2-Cost minion.
flavor: As birds of ill omen, these crows often summon Doomsayers.

name: WANTED!
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a Coin to your hand.
flavor: Wanted: Dead or Undead.

name: Wing Blast
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If a minion died this turn, this costs (1).
flavor: Emeriss uses Wing Blast.  It's super effective!

name: Wispering Woods
text: [x]Summon a 1/1 Wisp for\neach card in your hand.
flavor: We didn't actually fire the guy who named Dark Wispers.

name: Witchwood Piper
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw the lowest\nCost minion from your deck.
flavor: She rids villages of annoying pests, like rats and children.

name: Bewitched Guardian
text: [x]Taunt\nBattlecry: Gain +1 Health\n_for each card in your hand._
flavor: Amwitched. Beingwitched. Beenwitched.

name: Bonfire Elemental
text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, draw a card.
flavor: Next step: Marshmallow elementals.

name: Carrion Drake
text: Battlecry: If a minion died this turn, gain Poisonous.
flavor: Fits easily into overhead luggage bins.

name: Chief Inspector
text: Battlecry: Destroy all enemy Secrets.
flavor: Empty your pockets, I know you’ve got a Wandering Monster in there!

name: Clockwork Automaton
text: Double the damage and_healing of your Hero_Power.
flavor: Most mechs are pretty chill, but this one is all wound up.

name: Crowskin Pact
text: Transform a minion into a 'Crowskin Faithful' and take control of it.

name: Curio Collector
text: Whenever you draw a card, gain +1/+1.
flavor: Experts worry that curios are a gateway to face-collecting.

name: Darius Crowley
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage\nto all minions and choose\na Passive Treasure.

name: Darius Crowley
text: [x]Rush\nAfter this attacks and kills\na minion, gain +2/+2.
flavor: You either die a villain, or live long enough to see yourself become the hero.

name: Deathweb Spider
text: Battlecry: If your hero\ntook damage this turn, gain Lifesteal.
flavor: The itsy bitsy spiders climbed up the village wall. Then came the witch and the spiders ate them all.

name: Dollmaster Dorian
text: Whenever you draw a minion, summon a 1/1 copy of it.
flavor: The children were puzzled by the scratches covering the insides of their toy-boxes.

name: Duskfallen Aviana
text: On each player's turn, the first card played costs (0).
flavor: Someone called her "Tweety". She didn't take it well.

name: Festeroot Hulk
text: After a friendly minion attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Tree puns arboring.

name: Frenzied Trapper
text: Battlecry: Put 5 random Hunter Secrets into the_battlefield.

name: Ghostly Charger
text: Divine Shield\nRush
flavor: Maybe we should have called him Ghostly Rusher.

name: Glitter Moth
text: Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, double the Health of your other minions.
flavor: Some moths are attracted to flame. This one's attracted to disco.

name: Gloom Stag
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Majestic. Ethereal. Still pretty down in the dumps, though.

name: Holy Water
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a copy of it to your_hand.
flavor: For a healthier option, try Holy Water: Zero.

name: Muck Hunter
text: Rush\nBattlecry: Summon two 2/1_Mucklings for your opponent.
flavor: You think your job mucks.

name: Prince Liam
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform all\n1-Cost cards in your deck\n_into Legendary minions.
flavor: "I have a very particular set of skills. Skills that make me a nightmare for witches like you."

name: Princess
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain the\nDeathrattles of 3 random\nminions in your deck.

name: Princess's Bone
text: Copied Deathrattle from {0}.

name: Quartz Elemental
text: Can't attack while damaged.
flavor: These elementals, along with feldspar and mica, are often taken for granite.

name: Ricochet Shot
text: Deal $3 damage to a random character. Repeat this 12 times.

name: Rotten Applebaum
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Restore #4 Health to your hero.
flavor: Key ingredient in Gilnean applesauce.

name: Vilebrood Skitterer
text: Poisonous, Rush

name: Vilebrood Skitterer
text: Poisonous\nRush
flavor: It aspires to be a Vilebrood Dancer, but it has eight left feet.

name: Witchwood Grizzly
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Lose 1 Health for each card in your opponent's hand.
flavor: You know what they say about people with big hands? Small bears.

name: Chuck
text:
Discard all minions
from your hand and
deal their Attack to
the enemy hero.

name: Coffin Crasher
text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion from your hand.
flavor: Also does weddings.

name: Cursed Castaway
text: Rush\nDeathrattle: Draw a Combo card from your deck.
flavor: She was an ordinary castaway... until she found that cursed volleyball.

name: Deadly Arsenal
text: Reveal a weapon from your deck. Deal its Attack to all minions.
flavor: Oh look. A Gorehowl.

name: Genn Greymane
text: [x]Start of Game: If your deck has only even- Cost cards, your starting Hero Power costs (1).
flavor: Ever since Sylvanas killed his son, he's dreamed of getting… even.

name: Glinda Crowskin
text: Minions in your hand have_Echo.
flavor:
Summon an unlimited* number of minions!**


*Six
**Wisps

name: Holy Book
text: Silence and destroy a minion. Summon a 10/10 copy of it.

name: Lady in White
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast 'Inner Fire'\n_on every minion in your deck_\n(set Attack equal to Health).
flavor: She was a lady in polka dots until the gnomish laundromat incident.

name: Mossy Horror
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other_minions with 2_or_less_Attack.
flavor: The hills have eyes. And teeth. Pretty bad breath, too.

name: Nalaa the Redeemer
text: [x]Divine Shield. Taunt.\nAfter this minion survives\n damage, gain Divine Shield.

name: Sic 'Em
text: Summon 3 minions from your deck with the highest attack.

name: Toki, Time-Tinker
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random\nLegendary minion from\nthe past to your hand.
flavor: Just a twist to the left, one quarter turn to the right and … oops! Well, we didn’t need that timeline anyway.

name: Azalina Soulthief
text: Battlecry: Replace your hand with a copy of your_opponent's.
flavor: The cards are always golden on the other side.

name: Blackhowl Gunspire
text:
[x]Can't attack. Whenever
this minion takes damage,
deal 3 damage to a
random enemy.
flavor: The upper windows used to be for aiming. Then we thought: "Hey! MORE cannons!"

name: Bogshaper
text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a minion from your_deck.
flavor: The tricky part is getting them to HOLD their shape.

name: Bubba
text: Battlecry: Summon six 1/1 Bloodhounds to attack an enemy minion.

name: Countess Ashmore
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a Rush,\nLifesteal, and Deathrattle\ncard from your deck.
flavor: "1 minion… ah, ah, ah! 2 minions… ah, ah, ah! 3 minions… ah, ah, ah!"

name: Darkmire Moonkin
text: Spell Damage +2
flavor: Birds of a feather Moonfire together.

name: Furious Ettin
text: Taunt
flavor: One head is a morning person. The other head hates morning people.

name: Hallowed Water
text: Restore your hero\nto full Health.\n Draw 5 cards.

name: Lord Godfrey
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to\nall other minions. If any die,\nrepeat this Battlecry.
flavor: Betrayed the Alliance. Betrayed the Horde. All for 200 achievement points and a sweet, sweet hat.

name: Nightscale Matriarch
text: Whenever a friendly minion is healed, summon a 3/3_Whelp.
flavor: Everywhelp, get in here!

name: Worgen Abomination
text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all other damaged minions.
flavor: Does anyone want to play dead!?

name: Wyrmguard
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavor: They think they're trusted guardians. Dragons think they're convenient snacks.

name: Amalgamate
text: Destroy all minions. Summon an Amalgamation with the combined\nAttack and Health.

name: Bestiary
text: [x]Fill your board with\ncopies of random minions\nfrom your opponent's deck.

name: Cauldron Elemental
text: Your other Elementals have +2 Attack.
flavor: Decorating tip: Unused cauldrons can make a lovely elemental display.

name: Deranged Doctor
text: Deathrattle: Restore #8 Health to your hero.
flavor: Unfortunately, his doctorate is in Murloc Literature.

name: Gilnean Royal Guard
text: [x]Divine Shield, Rush\nEach turn this is in your hand,\nswap its Attack and Health.
flavor: Admittedly, they kind of dropped the ball with Prince Liam.

name: Gilnean Royal Guard
text: [x]Divine Shield, Rush\nEach turn this is in your hand,\nswap its Attack and Health.

name: Hagatha the Witch
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all minions.
flavor: Curse-bringer, tree-twister, mother of wretched things…Hanzo main.

name: Silver Sword
text: After your hero attacks, give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: Silver’s malleability limits its utility as an edged weapon. On the other hand... SHINY!

name: Splintergraft
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a friendly\nminion. Add a 10/10 copy to\nyour hand that costs (10).
flavor: We're going to need some bigger tweezers.

name: Splitting Festeroot
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Splitting Saplings.
flavor: No use crying over split Festeroot,

name: Tess Greymane
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 8 damage\nto all minions and choose\na Passive Treasure.

name: Tess Greymane
text: [x]Battlecry: Replay every card from another class you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Those who cannot remember their card history are doomed to repeat it.

name: Baku the Mooneater
text: [x]Start of Game: If your deck has only odd- Cost cards, upgrade your Hero Power.
flavor: In her defense, it did look like a cookie.

name: Shallow Graves
text: Summon 7 random minions that died this_game.

name: Shudderwock
text: [x]Battlecry: Repeat all other Battlecries from cards you played this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Beware the Shudderwock, my son. We're fresh out of vorpal daggers.

name: Alternate Timeline
text: Start a new game,\nbut your opponent's Health stays the same.

name: Emeriss
text: Battlecry: Double the Attack and Health of all minions in_your hand.
flavor: Taste your world's corruption! It tastes like chicken.

name: Seabreaker Goliath
text: Costs (1) less for each time you've fired your Cannons.
